item.title: 完美风暴推动白银突破 65 美元/盎司，创历史新高
item.description: 对白银的强劲投资需求、白银被列入美国重要矿产清单以及一轮势头强劲的买盘推动白银价格创下历史新高，使白银价格在2025年收盘时达到了年初价格的两倍多。【原文：Robust investment demand for silver, its inclusion on the U.S. critical minerals list, and a wave of momentum buying have propelled the white metal to a fresh record high, setting prices up to close out 2025 at more than double the level at which they began.】

item.title: 路透社报道后，共和党议员谴责英特尔测试与中国有关的工具
item.description: 共和党议员本周指责英特尔威胁美国国家安全，因为路透社披露这家芯片制造商正在评估一家与中国关系密切的公司生产的芯片制造设备，而这家公司的海外分支机构受到了美国政府的制裁。【原文：Republican lawmakers accused Intel this week of threatening U.S. national security after Reuters revealed the chipmaker was evaluating chipmaking equipment made by a company with deep ties to China and overseas units sanctioned by the U.S. government.】

item.title: 波兰金融监管机构为 Erste 收购桑坦德银行开绿灯
item.description: 波兰金融监管机构（KNF）周三发表声明称，已为 Erste Group Bank AG 收购 Santander Bank Polska 控股权的交易开了绿灯。【原文：The Polish financial regulator (KNF) has given a green light to Erste Group Bank AG’s purchase of a controlling stake in Santander Bank Polska , it said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: Telefonica 因成本和行政负担从纽约证券交易所退市美国存托股票
item.description: 西班牙电信巨头西班牙电信公司（Telefonica）周三表示，将把其美国存托股票（ADS）从纽约证券交易所退市，理由是维持其上市的行政负担和成本。【原文：Spanish telecoms giant Telefonica said on Wednesday it would delist its American Depositary Shares (ADS) from the New York Stock Exchange, citing the administrative burden and cost of keeping them listed.】

item.title: 安达信税务公司估值 23 亿美元，纽交所首日股价大涨
item.description: 安达信集团的股票周三在纽约证交所首次亮相时大涨约 31%，这家税务咨询公司的估值达到 23 亿美元，因为投资者押注于这个长期与审计质量相关的品牌，认为它的声誉包袱已经超过了审计质量。【原文：Andersen Group's shares jumped about 31% in their debut on the NYSE on Wednesday, valuing the tax advisory firm at $2.3 billion, as investors bet on the brand long-associated with audit quality outweighing its reputational baggage.】

item.title: 机身出现缺陷后，监管部门下令对部分空客A320飞机进行检查
item.description: 欧洲安全当局周三发布初步指示，要求航空公司检查数十架A320系列喷气机的机身面板，此前一家西班牙供应商的生产问题导致空中客车公司放慢了交付速度。【原文：European safety authorities issued preliminary instructions on Wednesday requiring airlines to inspect fuselage panels on dozens of A320-family jets after a production problem at a Spanish supplier prompted Airbus to slow deliveries.】

item.title: 备忘录称摩根大通任命 Edward Byun 为 ECM 技术全球主管
item.description: 根据路透社周三看到的一份备忘录，摩根大通任命 Edward Byun 为技术股权资本市场（ECM）全球主管，常驻旧金山。【原文：JPMorgan named Edward Byun as its global head of technology equity capital markets, or ECM, based in San Francisco, according to a memo seen by Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒尔表示 "绝对 "会捍卫美国中央银行的独立性
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）是明年接替美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的候选人之一，他周三表示，如果央行的独立性受到美国总统的挑战，他将 "绝对 "捍卫央行的独立性。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller, who is on the short list to succeed Fed Chair Jerome Powell next year, said on Wednesday he would "absolutely" defend the central bank's independence if it were challenged by a U.S. president.】

item.title: 特朗普政府要求美联储澄清 CFPB 资金供应情况
item.description: 根据法庭记录，美国司法部已要求美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）澄清央行是否已停止亏损，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的政府称，这使其无法为消费者金融保护的唯一联邦监督机构提供资金。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department has called on Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell to clarify whether the central bank has stopped losing money, which President Donald Trump's administration has said prevents it from funding the sole federal watchdog for consumer financial protection, according to court records.】

item.title: 加州为 28 部电影提供税收抵免，促进好莱坞电影在当地的生产
item.description: 加利福尼亚州为 28 个新电影项目提供了税收抵免，其中包括奥斯卡获奖导演李安即将上映的电影和说唱歌手 Snoop Dogg 的传记片。【原文：California has awarded tax credits to 28 new movie projects, including Oscar-winning director Ang Lee's upcoming film and rapper Snoop Dogg's biopic, as Hollywood's home state seeks to bolster local production and stem a years-long shift to other regions.】

item.title: 贝莱德和投资者达里奥将为 "特朗普账户 "提供资金支持
item.description: 亿万富翁投资人雷-达利欧（Ray Dalio）将为特朗普政府在康涅狄格州为某些儿童设立的投资账户提供资金，财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三表示，另一家公司也誓言为员工的捐款提供配比。【原文：Billionaire investor Ray Dalio will help fund the Trump administration's investment accounts for certain children in Connecticut Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Wednesday as another firm vowed to match employee contributions.】

item.title: 美国邮政向零售商和托运人招标最后一英里递送服务
item.description: 美国邮政服务公司（U.S. Postal Service）周三表示，该公司正在寻求提高其面向大型零售商和托运商的 "最后一英里 "递送网络的收入，因为该公司警告说，其财务状况即将出现紧缩，最快可能在2027年初就会耗尽现金。【原文：The U.S. Postal Service said Wednesday it is seeking to boost revenue from its "last-mile" delivery network to major retailers and shippers as it warns of a looming financial crunch and could run out of cash as soon as early 2027.】

item.title: 独家报道谷歌在Meta的帮助下努力削弱英伟达的软件优势
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司正在制定一项新的计划，使其人工智能芯片能够更好地运行全球使用最广泛的人工智能软件框架 PyTorch，此举旨在削弱英伟达公司长期以来在人工智能计算市场的主导地位。【原文：Alphabet's Google is working on a new initiative to make its artificial intelligence chips better at running PyTorch, the world’s most widely used AI software framework, in a move aimed at weakening Nvidia's longstanding dominance of the AI computing market, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Netflix 将于明年推出基于国际足联世界杯的足球视频游戏
item.description: Netflix 周三表示，将在其游戏产品组合中增加一款足球模拟游戏，这家流媒体巨头希望借助 2026 年国际足联世界杯赛深化其视频游戏业务。【原文：Netflix on Wednesday said it will add a soccer simulation title to its gaming portfolio, as the streaming giant looks to leverage the FIFA World Cup 2026 tournament to deepen its video game push.】

item.title: 巴西将于 2026 年从 "星链 "的中国竞争对手那里获得卫星互联网
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）的办公室主任鲁伊-科斯塔（Rui Costa）周三表示，中国低地球轨道卫星公司太空帆船（SpaceSail）将于2026年上半年开始为巴西偏远地区提供互联网接入服务。【原文：Chinese low Earth orbit satellite company SpaceSail will start providing internet access to remote areas in Brazil in the first half of 2026, President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva's chief of staff, Rui Costa, said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国确认与瑞士达成贸易协议的关税内容
item.description: 美国贸易代表周三宣布实施 11 月与瑞士和列支敦士登达成的贸易协定框架中与关税相关的内容。【原文：The U.S. Trade Representative on Wednesday announced the implementation of tariff-related elements in a trade agreement framework reached with Switzerland and Liechtenstein in November.】

item.title: 独家：中国如何打造 "曼哈顿计划"，在人工智能芯片领域与西方抗衡
item.description: 路透社获悉，在深圳一个戒备森严的实验室里，中国科学家制造出了华盛顿多年来一直试图阻止的东西：一台能够生产尖端半导体芯片的机器原型，这些芯片为人工智能、智能手机和西方军事主导地位的核心武器提供动力。【原文：In a high-security Shenzhen laboratory, Chinese scientists have built what Washington has spent years trying to prevent: a prototype of a machine capable of producing the cutting-edge semiconductor chips that power artificial intelligence, smartphones and weapons central to Western military dominance, Reuters has learned.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟发现公司董事会拒绝派拉蒙的恶意收购
item.description: 华纳兄弟 Discovery 公司董事会周三拒绝了派拉蒙 Skydance 公司价值 1,084 亿美元的恶意竞购，称其未能提供足够的融资保证。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery's board rejected Paramount Skydance's $108.4 billion hostile bid on Wednesday, saying it failed to provide adequate financing assurances.】

item.title: 随着空中出租车发展势头良好，Joby 的目标是将美国产量翻番
item.description: 乔比航空公司（Joby Aviation）周三表示，该公司将把美国的生产能力提高一倍，因为这家电动飞机制造商希望从空中出租车的需求中获利。【原文：Joby Aviation said on Wednesday it would double its U.S. manufacturing capacity, as the electric aircraft maker looks to cash in on demand for air-taxis.】

item.title: 耐克大举营销还不可能提高收益
item.description: 耐克公司的投资者本周将寻找迹象，表明上一季度出现的复苏是可持续的，更大的营销预算正在帮助这家运动服制造商夺回被更敏捷的竞争对手夺走的市场份额。【原文：Nike investors will look for signs this week that the recovery glimpsed last quarter is sustainable and that a bigger marketing budget is helping the sportswear maker claw back market share lost to nimbler rivals.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒尔称货币政策仍处于限制性领域，美联储仍有削减空间
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）周三表示，由于担心就业市场疲软，美国央行仍有降息空间。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said Wednesday that the U.S. central bank still has room to cut interest rates amid concerns that the job market has softened.】

item.title: Roblox 游戏平台称已准备好做出改变以解除对俄罗斯的禁令
item.description: 美国游戏平台 Roblox 周三表示，为了推翻俄罗斯本月早些时候对其实施的禁令，该公司愿意对其在俄罗斯的部分功能进行修改。【原文：U.S. gaming platform Roblox said on Wednesday it was willing to make changes to some of its features in Russia in order to overturn a ban imposed on it earlier this month.】

item.title: 美国撤销对破产的 Tricolor 公司高管欺诈行为的指控
item.description: 美国检察官周三公布了一份起诉书，指控破产汽车经销商三色控股公司（Tricolor Holdings）的高管涉嫌欺诈。【原文：U.S. prosecutors on Wednesday unsealed an indictment charging the executives of bankrupt auto dealer Tricolor Holdings in connection to a fraud scheme.】

item.title: Criteria 从贝莱德购买 2% 的 Naturgy 股份后，持股比例增至 26
item.description: 西班牙标准公司（Criteria）发言人周三在向市场监管机构 CNMV 提交文件后表示，该公司以约 4.85 亿欧元（5.68 亿美元）的价格收购了能源公司 Naturgy 2% 的股份，使其持股比例升至 25.986%。【原文：Spain's Criteria has bought a 2% stake in energy firm Naturgy for around 485 million euros ($568 million), lifting its holding to 25.986%, a spokesperson for Criteria said on Wednesday following a filing to market supervisor CNMV.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，在蓝猫头鹰融资谈判陷入僵局后，甲骨文公司耗资 100 亿美元的密歇根数据中心项目陷入困境
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三报道，甲骨文最大的数据中心合作伙伴蓝猫资本（Blue Owl Capital）将不会支持甲骨文下一个数据中心的 100 亿美元交易，因为该软件集团面临的债务上升和人工智能支出问题日益严重。【原文：Oracle's largest data center partner Blue Owl Capital will not back a $10 billion deal for its next facility, as the software group faces increased concerns about its rising debt and artificial intelligence spending, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 数据中心需求旺盛，电子公司捷普预测全年业绩乐观
item.description: 捷普（Jabil）周三预计全年营收和利润将超过华尔街预期，这家电子元件制造商希望利用人工智能驱动的数据中心需求，这使其股价在盘前交易中上涨超过 5.8%。【原文：Jabil forecast annual revenue and profit above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as the electronic component maker looks to capitalize on artificial intelligence-driven demand for data centers, sending its shares up more than 5.8% in premarket trade.】

item.title: Coursera 收购 Udemy，斥资 25 亿美元成立公司，瞄准人工智能培训
item.description: 在线教育平台 Coursera 周三表示，将以全股票交易的方式收购竞争对手 Udemy，合并后的公司估值为 25 亿美元。【原文：Online education platform Coursera said on Wednesday it would buy rival Udemy in an all-stock deal, valuing the combined company at $2.5 billion, as the industry consolidates after a post-pandemic slowdown and heightened investor scrutiny.】

item.title: 前比特币矿工签署 70 亿美元人工智能数据中心租约，Hut 8 股价大涨
item.description: Hut 8 公司周三表示，它已签署了一份价值约 70 亿美元的协议，将在路易斯安那州租赁一个数据中心。【原文：Hut 8 has signed a deal valued at about $7 billion to lease a data center in Louisiana, it said on Wednesday, as former cryptocurrency miners pivot to meet surging demand for artificial intelligence infrastructure.】

item.title: 财务主管认为明年美国物价将上涨，关税仍是首要问题
item.description: 一项调查显示，公司财务总监继续将关税列为首要关注问题，并平均认为明年物价将上涨 4%左右，这可能会加剧美国联邦储备委员会的担忧，即当前的物价压力将使其无法在短期内实现 2% 的通胀目标。【原文：Company finance chiefs continue to cite tariffs as a top concern and on average see prices rising around 4% next year, according to a survey that may add to U.S. Federal Reserve concerns that current price pressures will keep it from reaching its 2% inflation target anytime soon.】

item.title: 尽管黄金创下 1979 年以来最大涨幅，但预计明年黄金将再次闪耀
item.description: 2025 年，黄金价格创下自 1979 年石油危机以来的最大涨幅，在过去两年里翻了一番。【原文：Gold has made its biggest jump since the 1979 oil crisis in 2025 -- with prices doubling in the last two years -- a performance which might previously have meant forecasts of a big correction.】
